body: Duergar have long warred against their dwarven cousins and the hated drow. Duergar with this racial trait receive a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the dwarf or elf subtypes. This racial trait replaces the invisibility spell-like ability.
name: Blood Enmity
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Duergar/Alternate Racial Traits/Blood Enmity
